Name: Battle Imagine - Crimson Sprayer
Description:
Use to activate or upgrade the Battle Imagine skill of Crimson Sprayer - Stunt! Flying Wheel Fire Dance.

Stunt! Flying Wheel Fire Dance
Resonance Elite - Crimson Sprayer's power, deals Attack Damage to surrounding enemies and inflicts severe injury on the targets hit.
"Severe Injury" - Reduces Healing Receive effects by 100%, lasting 10s.
Description$english:

Stunt! Flying Wheel Fire Dance

Description2$english: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
